entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:17 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 6:17 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
